You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dd;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&DD;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2145/index.htm U+02145].
  * `&dd;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2146/index.htm U+02146].
